name: Opfertag in Bayern, 1916 LCCN2004665981 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Opfertag in Bayern, 1916 Abstract: Poster shows a sword piercing a burning globe of the world. Text announces Offering Day in Bavaria. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph ; 116 x 71cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Signed with the artist's monogram.; Title from item.; AM.
